text: Taylor Swift's sexual assault trial against former radio DJ David Mueller will begin its third day in Denver today. Mueller is suing Swift because he was fired from his radio co - host job in 2013 after she claimed he lifted her skirt and grabbed her butt while they posed for a photo at a meet and greet during her Denver Red Tour concert. Swift filed a countersuit a month later for sexual assault and battery.
